about_the_game:
Are you a fan of classic adventure games with over-the-top protagonists? Then look no further! A Little Less Desperation offers an epic space adventure filled with quirky characters, bizarre species, and challenging puzzles that hark back to the golden age of point-and-click adventure games.



The galaxy is threatened by powerful and evil forces, and only a ragtag band of alien rebels stand in their way. Lacking manpower, technology, knowledge and funding, this plucky band of misfits is in desperate need of a hero. Enter Harold, an alien whose spaceship has crashed on Earth. His only hope of salvation? Jacob, an organic vegetable farmer with zero technological know-how.



We won't spoil the story by telling you that both Jacob and Harold will be abducted into space to find out if they have the guts to stand up to evil and save the galaxy. Help Jacob on his quest, meeting lots of quirky characters, strange species and solving tons of classic adventure game puzzles, just like the good old days!



FEATURES

■ Classic 2.5D point-and-click gameplay: Immerse yourself in a nostalgic adventure filled with engaging puzzles and rich storytelling.

■ Stunning hand-drawn environments: Explore beautifully crafted worlds that bring the galaxy to life.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04, Mint 17 or later
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Single Core Processor or 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 1 GB RAM (Shared Memory is not recommended)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.15 Catalina or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz (Dual Core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10 or later
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz (Single Core) or 2 GHz (Dual Core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: When a peaceful farmer is abducted by an alien, he cannot imagine how this experience will turn him into a hero that needs to save the galaxy. Suddenly, alien abduction is funny again.
